scripts.nuke: pnpm nuke:packages && pnpm nuke:apps && pnpm nuke:lockfile
scripts.nuke:packages: for d in packages/*/node_modules packages/*/*/node_modules packages/*/*/*/node_modules packages/*/dist packages/*/*/dist packages/*/*/*/dist packages/*/.turbo packages/*/*/.turbo packages/*/*/*/.turbo; do if [ -d $d ]; then echo $d; rm -rf $d; fi; done
scripts.nuke:apps: rm -rf node_modules .next .turbo storybook-static .vercel; for d in apps/*/node_modules apps/*/.next apps/*/.turbo apps/*/storybook-static apps/*/.vercel; do if [ -d $d ]; then echo $d; rm -rf $d; fi; done
